Package model

Interface ModelIF

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PokerGameEngine
    public interface ModelIF
    The interface for game engines. The Controller is connected to this interface so it can call different game engines when needed.
    Version:
    1.1 04.05.2021
    Author:
    Aki K, Tuomas R, Jere L, Ville R, Tatu N

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void dealCards()
      Deals cards in model and sends cards to controller.
      static double getBet()
      Gets model bet.
      Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the current player to controller
      void setCardsToSwapIndexes​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes)
      Sets up indexes which cards are going to be swapped.
      void setCashout​(java.lang.Boolean decision)
      Sets the cashout decision of pokergame.
      void setDatabaseConnection​(DAOIF dao)
      Sets connection to database in controller so it can be passed down to model
      void setHighOrLow​(java.lang.String value)
      Sets the high or low value which user has decided in view.
      void setPlayer1​(Player player)
      Re setting the player1 while a game is already running for example upon logging out but continuing with same connection
      void setScore()
      Sends game score to controller after game.
      void setUpSinglePlayerGame​(Player player)
